# Masked Relationship

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(dagitty)
library(rethinking)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data(milk)
milk_df <- 
  milk %>%
  mutate(K = standardize(kcal.per.g),
         N = standardize(neocortex.perc),
         M = standardize(log(mass)), 
         iM = cut_number(M, 3), 
         iN = cut_number(N, 3)) %>%
  na.omit()

ggplot(milk_df, aes(x = N, y=K, color=iM)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method="lm", formula=y~x, se=FALSE)

ggplot(milk_df, aes(x = M, y=K, color=iN)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method="lm", formula=y~x, se=FALSE)

```
